name: homepage
description: Homepage is a customizable, YAML driven dashboard for homelab services. It supports widgets for system stats, media libraries, monitoring tools and dynamic service discovery, serving as a central control panel for your infrastructure.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Define your entire dashboard layout and services in simple YAML files

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Automatically discover and monitor Docker containers on your system

features.title: Kubernetes Ready
features.description: Monitor pods, deployments, and cluster resources

features.title: REST API
features.description: Create widgets for any service with a REST API

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Add search bars for Google, DuckDuckGo, or custom search engines
